title: For Clinton, an apology at last for email controversy
text: For Clinton, an apology at last for email controversy Wednesday, 9 September 2015 (11 minutes ago) It took three interviews and five days for Hillary Rodham Clinton to say "I'm sorry." Clinton Says She's Sorry for Private Email 01:38 Facing increasing pressure over her approach to handling the ongoing email controversy that has dogged her campaign, Hillary Clinton told ABC News her private email server was a mistake. AP's Julie Pace discusses what led up to the apology.
